sections.heading: and curtesy, abolished.The estates of dower and curtesy are hereby abolished
sections.text: SourceLaws 1907, c. 49, § 4, p. 197;R.S.1913, § 1268;C.S.1922, § 1223;C.S.1929, § 30-104;R.S.1943, § 30-104.AnnotationsSurviving husband is heir of deceased wife as to personal property. In re Hanson's Estate, 118 Neb. 208,
